name: Think Dice!
description:
puzzle platformer made of dice; use your Dot Gun to change the values of the die in your environment. 

***TUTORIAL***

Left click  to +1 to a dice 

Right click to -1 to a dice

AD to move forward and back, space to jump

the number on the dice affects all die differently - some move in different directions, some become solid, some get more bouncy the higher the number... jump in and try it out for yourself!

made for the GMTK 2022 game jam with the theme Roll of the Dice, with Team Welp. :)
